languages.text: "Нет!" {n}Старик яростно трясет головой.{/n} "Кара! За это тебя настигнет кара Его!"
"No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"
languages.original_text: "Нет!" {n}Старик яростно трясет головой.{/n} "Кара! За это тебя настигнет кара Его!"

languages.text: «¡No!». {n}El anciano niega furiosamente con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Retribución! ¡No escapará a Su retribución por esto!».
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No!». {n}El anciano niega furiosamente con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Retribución! ¡No escapará a Su retribución por esto!».

languages.text: 「いいや！」{n}老人は激しく頭を振る。{/n}「報復だ！お前は主の報復からは逃れられない！」
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"

traits.locale_text: 「いいや！」{n}老人は激しく頭を振る。{/n}「報復だ！お前は主の報復からは逃れられない！」

languages.text: “不！”{n}老人愤怒地摇着头。{/n}“报应！你别想逃过祂的报应！”
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"

traits.locale_text: “不！”{n}老人愤怒地摇着头。{/n}“报应！你别想逃过祂的报应！”

languages.text: "Nein!" {n}Der alte Mann schüttelt wütend den Kopf.{/n} "Vergeltung! Ihr werdet hierfür Seiner Vergeltung nicht entkommen!"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein!" {n}Der alte Mann schüttelt wütend den Kopf.{/n} "Vergeltung! Ihr werdet hierfür Seiner Vergeltung nicht entkommen!"

languages.text: « Non ! {n}rétorque le vieillard en secouant furieusement la tête.{/n} Châtiment ! Si vous le faites, vous n'échapperez pas à Son châtiment ! »
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! {n}rétorque le vieillard en secouant furieusement la tête.{/n} Châtiment ! Si vous le faites, vous n'échapperez pas à Son châtiment ! »

languages.text: "Hayır!" {n}İhtiyar adam, kafasını öfkeyle sallıyor.{/n} "İntikam! Bu yaptığınızla O'nun intikamından kaçamayacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The old man shakes his head furiously.{/n} "Retribution! You won't escape His retribution for this!"
